metadata.name: Christmas In The 90's -JayRa
metadata.description:
Welcome to the holiday edition of my Hip-Hop Instrumental NFT series! As the end of the year approaches, I wanted to take a moment to thank you for your support and share a special gift with you â€“ a FREE NFT featuring one of my original instrumental tracks.

I hope that this NFT brings you joy and helps you to end 2022 on a high note. As we look ahead to the new year, I am excited to continue creating and sharing my music with you, and I have lots of exciting projects and collaborations in the works.

Thank you for being a part of my journey as a music creator. It is all love, nothing but, and always is. I hope that you have a wonderful end to the year and that 2023 is even better. Peace and love to you all. <3
